title: What are our responsibilities?
intro_list: Among the main duties of Customer Service, the following stand out:
intro_p: Customer Service acts as the voice of the company to the customer and the voice of the customer to the company, ensuring a constant flow of information and improvements.
img_alt: Call center team working in modern environment

c1.title: Multichannel Service
c1.text: Offer excellent service through different channels: phone, email, chat and electronic means.

c2.title: Inbound Service
c2.text: Provide information, receive complaints, suggestions and compliments, handle objections and offer solutions.

active_text: Perform outbound services, especially in promotional campaigns and actions related to the Group's Cards:

t1.title: 1. Card activation
t1.text: Contact customers to activate newly issued cards.

t2.title: 2. Profile update
t2.text: Keep customer data always up to date.

t3.title: 3. Promotion communication
t3.text: Inform about exclusive offers and benefits.

t4.title: 4. Cancellation reversal
t4.text: Work to retain customers who wish to cancel services.

a1.title: ðŸ“‹ Management and Continuous Improvement
a1.l1: Organize and tabulate data, prepare reports and support team demands.
a1.l2: Act proactively in identifying improvements in scripts and service standards.
a1.l3: Contribute to the continuous evolution of the service provided.

a2.title: ðŸŽ“ Professional development
a2.text: Knowledge of responsibilities allows you to act with more confidence and assertiveness, contributing to your career evolution.

quiz.question: You notice that several customers are calling with the same question about a new promotion. What is the best attitude aligned with Customer Service's continuous improvement responsibilities?
quiz.opt_a: A) Continue serving each one individually without reporting the fact.
quiz.opt_b: B) Complain to colleagues that customers can't read the terms.
quiz.opt_c: C) Report the observed pattern to the supervisor so that the promotion communication can be adjusted.
quiz.opt_d: D) Tell the customer to look for the information on the website.
quiz.feedback: Correct Answer! Proactivity in identifying patterns helps improve the process for everyone.
